plot: Timmy's sick and tired of having strict parents and wishes for care-free parents./To help his Mom win the Dimmsdale "Veg-off," Timmy wishes her garden was full of life.

"Ruled Out", Timmy wishes his parents would stop caring, because of rules. how will he get his parents to do their adult responsibilities? not with magic since that wish included godparents, so how? +"That's Life", his wish revives a pet who wants revenge. how will he save his parents?—N the Fan
